Examples

{% raw %} 
ds = xr.open_dataset("data/rca_unrot_data_1_5.nc", use_cftime = True)
ds = ds.rename({"rlon":"lon", "rlat":"lat"})
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
stormtrack = storm(ds = ds)
stormtrack.set_up(force = True)
